title: Terms tests for Grades 9, 10 and 11 to be held as planned
body_lines: The Provincial Department of Education has decided to conduct term examinations for Grades 9, 10 and 11 in schools in the Western Province from March 29 as planned.
The exams were postponed due to the shortage of printing papers and printing equipment in the local market.
All schools were earlier advised to print the examination papers for grades 6, 7 and 8 term tests at the expense of the schools
As papers required for the printing of question papers have been received, the exams will be held as scheduled earlier.
The term tests for Grades 06, 07 and 08 students commenced from today (21).
